edu.stanford.nlp.mt.base

Class TrieARPALanguageModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.base.ARPALanguageModel
      • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.base.TrieARPALanguageModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LanguageModel<IString>

    public class TrieARPALanguageModel
extends ARPALanguageModel
    Language model internally repesented as a trie. Takes 2-3 times longer to load compared to ARPALanguageModel, but saves 30-50% memory.
    Author:
    Michel Galley (trie representation), Daniel Cer (code copied from ARPALanguageModel)

      • scoreR

        protected double scoreR(Sequence<IString> sequence)
        From CMU language model headers: ------------------------------------------------------------------ This file is in the ARPA-standard format introduced by Doug Paul. p(wd3|wd1,wd2)= if(trigram exists) p_3(wd1,wd2,wd3) else if(bigram w1,w2 exists) bo_wt_2(w1,w2)*p(wd3|wd2) else p(wd3|w2) p(wd2|wd1)= if(bigram exists) p_2(wd1,wd2) else bo_wt_1(wd1)*p_1(wd2)
        Overrides:
        scoreR in class ARPALanguageModel
